name: UFGCompassObjectWidget
comment: Copyright 2016-2018 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: UpdatePositionInCompass
methods.comment: Updates the position and tint in the compass for this CompassObject. Should only be called from within the CompassWidget

methods.name: SetAsStaticDirection
methods.comment: Sets this CompassObject as a static direction in relation to the player's location (e.g. cardinal coordinates). Must be normalized!

methods.name: SetActorRepresentation
methods.comment: Setter for the Actor Representations that this CompassObject is set to represent

methods.name: GetActorRepresentation
methods.comment: Getter for the Actor Representation that this CompassObject is set to represent

methods.name: OnCompassObjectAddedToPanel
methods.comment: This function is called when the compass object is added to the compass. This function should deal with layouts, anchoring, positioning, etc.

methods.name: OnCompassObjectUpdated
methods.comment: This function is called when the representation of the compass object is updated.

methods.name: OnObjectCentered
methods.comment: This function is called when the representation of the compass object is updated.

methods.name: GetLastCachedDistanceFromPlayer
methods.comment: Get the last cached distance between the actor this object is representing and the player

properties.name: mCompassObjectFilteredVisibility
properties.comment: If this object should be able to be visible

properties.name: mViewDistance
properties.comment: The distance where this object should no longer be visible on the compass

properties.name: LastCachedDistanceFromPlayer
properties.comment: The last cached distance between the actor this object is representing and the player
